front.title: •Stalker (V)
front.gametext: May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers, 2 vehicles, and 4 TIEs. Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. Once per game, may follow an opponent's starship that just moved from here (if within range).
front.lore: Originally assigned to search the Outer Rim for new worlds to subjugate. Launched the probe droid that found Echo Base. Later reassigned to Death Squadron.
